title: Con Air 1997 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
The belong the belt, because the Oscar winner Nicoleas Cage (The Other Face / The Rock), will lead you to the most shocking flight of your life. A filem of action and suspense, the same creator of The Rock and Crimson Tide ... An aircraft is carrying the most dangerous criminals in the world. Cameron Poe (Cage) has just come on parole and is just hitching a ride to find his family. Suddenly, he finds himself involved in a terrifying kidnapping planned by Cyrus The Virus (John Malkovich), one of the coldest and sordid men in the world. In midair, Cameron tries desperately to control the unbearable tension situation, while a brave government agent (John Cusack) risks his life to convince his superiors not to explode the plane. With spectacular special effects and unreleased performances stunt, this thriller is pure adrenaline. With Air - The Way Trail is a most fantastic action movie of recent times! You will lose your breath away!
